nodes.text: Ghecharo was a nobleman who visited Exovar's Emporium on Neftali for a hunting expedition. When Kaori Batta tried to cancel it due to bad weather, Ghecharo insisted they go on as planned, stating his royal itinerary could not be changed.

While out hunting, they stumbled upon a wounded modrol hiding in a cave. Kaori attempted to talk Ghecharo into avoiding the dangerous animal, but Ghecharo considered this cowardly and instead entered the cave with his adjutant Kleck where he was killed by the modrol.
